author: Jacob Dressler
description:
One longtime Marvel actor’s time in the MCU might soon be coming to an end. At the very least, that’s how it seems in one of the new teaser trailers released for the upcoming Marvel Cinematic Universe crossover event Avengers: Doomsday. The upcoming Avengers sequel is expected to be a major gamechanger for the film [...]

title: Marvel Actor’s Time In MCU Likely Coming To An End

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
